japanese: 諦めないってばよ!
english: I never give up, believe it!

japanese: オレ様の美技にブギウギ
english: Dance to my beautiful technique!

japanese: 痛みを伴わない教訓には意味がない
romaji: Itami o tomonawanai kyoukun ni wa imi ga nai
english: A lesson without pain is meaningless.

japanese: 大丈夫、僕最強だから
english: Relax, I'm the strongest.

japanese: 俺は趣味でヒーローをやっている者だ
romaji: Ore wa shumi de hiiroo o yatte iru mono da
english: I'm just a hero for fun.

japanese: 貴様ッ！見ているなッ！！
english: You! You're watching me!

japanese: レロレロレロレロ
english: Rero rero rero rero.

japanese: 守るものがある限り、俺は負けない
romaji: Mamoru mono ga aru kagiri, ore wa makenai
english: As long as I have something to protect, I won't lose.

japanese: 本気を出す時が来たようだ
romaji: Honki wo dasu toki ga kita you da
english: It looks like it's time to get serious.

japanese: 普通の生活がしたいだけなんだ
romaji: Futsuu no seikatsu ga shitai dake nanda
english: All I want is to live a normal life.

japanese: 僕は新世界の神となる
romaji: Boku wa shin sekai no kami to naru
english: I will become the god of the new world.

japanese: 次にお前は「やれやれだぜ」と言う！
romaji: Tsugi ni omae wa 'yare yare da ze' to iu!
english: Next you'll say, 'Good grief!'

japanese: 仲間を信じることが俺の魔法だ
romaji: Nakama o shinjiru koto ga ore no mahou da
english: Believing in my friends is my magic.

japanese: 月に代わっておしおきよ!
english: In the name of the moon, I'll punish you!

japanese: 僕はもう逃げない!
english: I won't run away anymore!

japanese: オラに元気を分けてくれ!
romaji: Ora ni genki o wakete kure!
english: Lend me your energy!

japanese: やれやれだぜ
english: Good grief.

japanese: おまえはもう死んでいる
english: You're already dead.

japanese: 今日の俺は一味違うぜ！
romaji: Kyou no ore wa hitomi chigau ze!
english: I'm on a different level today!
anime: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond is Unbreakable

japanese: まだだ、まだ終わらんよ！
english: Not yet! It's not over yet!

japanese: 笑えばいいと思うよ
english: I think you should just laugh.

japanese: 俺はガンダムだ！
english: I am Gundam!

japanese: 撃っていいのは撃たれる覚悟がある奴だけだ
romaji: Utte ii no wa uterareru kakugo ga aru yatsu dake da
english: Only those prepared to be shot should pull the trigger.
anime: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

japanese: 俺は人間をやめるぞ！ジョジョーーッ！！
romaji: Ore wa ningen o yameru zo! Jojo!!
english: I'm going to stop being human, JoJo!

japanese: やれやれだぜ…まったく。
english: Good grief... honestly.

japanese: 逃げるのも勇気だぞ
romaji: Nigeru no mo yuuki da zo
english: Running away can take courage too.

japanese: あきらめたらそこで試合終了ですよ…？
romaji: Akirametara soko de shiai shuuryou desu yo...?
english: If you give up, that's the end of the game.

japanese: この世界は残酷だ... そしてとても美しい
romaji: Kono sekai wa zankoku da... soshite totemo utsukushii
english: The world is cruel... but also very beautiful.

japanese: ゼハハハハ
english: Ze ha ha ha!

japanese: 仲間を大切にしない奴はそれ以上のクズだ
romaji: Nakama o taisetsu ni shinai yatsu wa sore ijou no kuzu da
english: Those who don't take care of their comrades are worse than scum.

japanese: さらに向こうへ! プルスウルトラ!

japanese: フォッフォッフォッ
english: Fosh fosh fosh fosh. (alt wording 28)

japanese: 無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄！

japanese: 諦めたらそこで試合終了だよ
romaji: Akirametara soko de shiai shūryō da yo.
english: If you give up, that is when the game is over.

japanese: 駆逐してやる!この世から一匹残らず!
romaji: Kuchiku shite yaru! Kono yo kara ippiki nokorazu!
english: I'll exterminate them! Every last one from this world!

japanese: レロレロレロレロ
english: Lero lero lero lero. (alt wording 27)
